heading: What is a score simulator tool?
content: The Score Simulator is a tool that allows you to simulate different credit behaviours on your existing CIBIL Report, and generates simulated CIBIL Score. This feature is designed to help you understand how various credit behaviours can affect your existing CIBIL Score thus empowering you to take informed decisions.
